it can be difficult.

That's probably us. We should probably head back.
Yeah, let's do it.
Lead the way.
-Hope you got some good pictures. -Oh, I did.
translation.es: - Ojalá hayan tomado lindas fotos.- Sí.

translation.en: In fact, uh, when I print them out, would you like some copies?
translation.es: Cuando las imprima, ¿le hago unas copias?

translation.en: I'd like that.
-How much do I owe you? -I got this.
It's okay, I can get it.
No, it's for the Gala. And this way I know you won't up-charge me.
translation.es: No, es para la gala.Así no podrás subirme el precio.

translation.en: Uh, no change necessary, sir. Merry Christmas.
translation.es: Así está bien, señor. Feliz Navidad.

translation.en: Well, that's mighty generous of you.
Merry Christmas to you both.
-Let me take this to the car. -Sure.
-Your employer, you say? -Yep.
So my aunt was just telling me that the Harrison Foundation holds events every week in town for veterans.
translation.es: Mi tía me contó que la Fundación Harrisonorganiza eventos semanales para veteranos.

translation.en: -You don't say? -Yeah. Yeah.
That's her card.
There's meals, entertainment, and they got a holiday festival coming up.
translation.es: Sirven comida, hay espectáculosy pronto harán un festival navideño.

translation.en: Should check it out. They'd love your company. I might just do that.
translation.es: - Debería ir. Será un placer su visita.- Quizá te haga caso.

translation.en: Happy holidays, Thomas.
Thanks, guys. Bye-bye.
-Thank you. -Bye.
What?
You might be a better ambassador for your family's foundation than you think.
translation.es: Quizá seas mejor embajadorde la fundación de lo que crees.

translation.en: Sounds like you and Carson had fun. Surprisingly, it was a lot of fun.
translation.es: - Creo que te divertiste con Carson.- Aunque parezca increíble, sí.

translation.en: Is he single?
It's strictly a professional relationship.
Even if I was interested, which I'm not, he lives his life out of a suitcase.
translation.es: Aunque estuviera interesada,y no lo estoy, vive viajando.

translation.en: So? People make long-distance relationships work all the time.
translation.es: ¿Y? Las relaciones a distanciano siempre fracasan.

translation.en: Okay, but if you're not on the same page, or in the same place,
translation.es: Sí, pero si cada unoestá en momentos distintos de la vida,

translation.en: it can only end in heartbreak.
Hey, Carson isn't Phil, okay?
He's not gonna string you along with empty promises.
translation.es: No te engatusará con promesas vacías.

translation.en: I know, but I'm not willing to make the same mistake twice.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero no estoy dispuestaa cometer el mismo error.

translation.en: There's no point in getting involved if there's no future.
translation.es: No tiene sentido si no tenemos futuro.

translation.en: Besides, we have nothing in common. Why would you say that?
translation.es: - Además, no tenemos nada en común.- ¿Por qué lo dices?

translation.en: He is a trust fund baby, and I've been working since I was 15.
translation.es: Él nació en cuna de oroy yo trabajo desde los 15 años.

translation.en: If I fail, I lose everything. There's no safety net.
translation.es: Si fracaso, lo pierdo todo.Nadie me protege.

translation.en: Uh, we're not going to fail.
This Gala is going to be the making of Molly's Menu Magic.
translation.es: Esta gala marcará el éxitode El menú mágico de Molly.

translation.en: That is the goal. Tomorrow we're prepping the main courses.
translation.es: Es la idea. Mañana empezaremoscon los platos principales.

translation.en: Oh, did you hear that the Bradford Bros. snagged City Hall's New Year's Eve party?
translation.es: ¿Oíste que Bradford Bros. harála fiesta de Año Nuevo del ayuntamiento?

translation.en: Yes. All the more reason this has to go perfectly.
translation.es: Sí, otra razónpara que todo salga perfecto.

translation.en: Aren't you coming?
I found a new fudge recipe I wanna try.
translation.es: Quiero probar otra receta de dulces.

translation.en: -Is it for Jean, again? -Yes.
Even if I have to attempt it a hundred times, I will get it right.
translation.es: Lo lograré aunque me lleve cien intentos.

translation.en: Well, I really hope it doesn't take that many times.
Good luck.
-Thanks. I'll see you in the morning. -Good night.
Molly, hello. What can I do for you?
I have something for you to try.
translation.es: Le traje algo para que pruebe.

translation.en: You are so kind continuing to attempt to re-create it.
translation.es: Qué amable al seguir intentando recrearlo.

translation.en: This time I used an old-fashioned recipe using brown sugar.
translation.es: Esta vez usé una receta antiguacon azúcar morena.

translation.en: Go ahead and take a piece.
Here's hoping.
What do you think?
It's delicious, but it's not my grandfather's.
translation.es: Delicioso, pero no escomo el de mi abuelo.

translation.en: I'll keep trying to make it work. Maybe it's the cocoa powder.
translation.es: Seguiré intentando.Quizá es por el cacao en polvo.

translation.en: Your time is valuable.
You don't need to waste any more of it on further fruitless attempts to please me.
translation.es: No es necesario que lo desperdiciesintentando complacerme en vano.

translation.en: I don't mind.
I have news.
I can tell by the look on your face that it isn't good.
translation.es: Por tu cara, veo que no son buenas.

translation.en: What is it this time? Molly, please, wait.
translation.es: ¿Y ahora qué? Molly, espera, por favor.

translation.en: Pierre phoned.
He wishes he could help, and he apologizes, but the sculpture won't be ready until after the Gala.
translation.es: Dijo que desearía ayudar y se disculpó,pero la escultura no estará a tiempo.

translation.en: There goes that idea.
Robert, do you still have the number for that antique restorer?
translation.es: Robert, ¿guardaste el númerode la restauradora de antigüedades?

translation.en: Susan?
-Sarah? -Sutton.
-Sutton Paige? -Yes, that's the one.
Perhaps she has some antiques she would donate.
-I'll get it right away. -Thank you.
Now, Molly, Carson showed me your menu this morning.
translation.es: Molly, Carsonme mostró el menú esta mañana.

translation.en: I hope he's being helpful. Yes, very helpful.
translation.es: - Espero que te esté ayudando.- Sí, mucho.

translation.en: Good. This is the first time that he's participated in any of our foundation's events, so I'm glad to hear it.
translation.es: Genial. Es la primera vez que participade nuestros eventos, así que me alegra.

translation.en: I have made some changes to the menu.
translation.es: Le hice algunos cambios al menú.

translation.en: Oh, right, of course.
No problem at all.
Wonderful.
We have a problem.
Jean would like beef Wellington instead of the prime rib entrée.
translation.es: En vez de costillas,Jean quiere lomo a la Wellington.

translation.en: Nix the ricotta meatballs. We can use them for the McCue lunch?
translation.es: Y olvida las albóndigas.¿Servirán para otro pedido?

translation.en: She saw the candy cane dessert and would prefer we do not serve those because they do not look professional.
translation.es: Además, rechazó los bastones de carameloporque no le parecen profesionales.

translation.en: I mean, they haven't even been baked or decorated yet.
translation.es: ¡Pero aún no los horneé ni los decoré!

translation.en: -[sighs] She's something else. -Who's something else?
I'll call you back.
Hi. Sorry to interrupt.
Uh… I thought you approved the menu. Oh, I did. Why?
translation.es: - Creí que habías aprobado el menú.- Así es. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: I'll talk to her. She put me in charge, she needs to trust me.
translation.es: Hablaré con ella. Tiene que confiar en mí.

translation.en: No, I don't wanna cause any trouble. I'll do whatever she wants.
translation.es: No, no quiero causar problemas.Haré lo que me pida.

translation.en: It's fine.
I don't know why the menu's such a big deal anyway.
translation.es: No sé por qué se hacen tanto problema.

translation.en: Everyone's gonna love whatever delicious entrée you make.
translation.es: A todos les encantará lo que prepares.

translation.en: And I didn't spend all that time braiding those cookies not to serve them.
translation.es: Invertí mi tiempo en trenzar galletas,así que pienso servirlas.

translation.en: -Seriously, don't worry about it. -No.
I don't think you understand.
This dinner and Jean Harrison's opinion, it can make or break my career.
translation.es: Mi carrera depende de esta cenay de la opinión de Jean Harrison.

translation.en: I love my aunt.
But she runs one wonderful but, in the grand scheme of things, relatively small foundation.
translation.es: Dirige una fundación maravillosa,pero bastante pequeña, si lo piensas.

translation.en: I don't know why people make a big deal of one person's opinion, to be honest.
translation.es: No sé por qué les preocupa tantola opinión de una persona.

translation.en: Okay, I know you grew up with it, but do you know anything about your family's foundation?
translation.es: Bueno, sé que forma parte de tu vida,pero ¿sabes algo acerca de la fundación?

translation.en: Well… Just…
Come with me.
Where are we going?
You'll see. This time, you have to trust me.
translation.es: Ya verás. Esta vez,tú deberás confiar en mí.

translation.en: -All right, but I'm driving. -Fine, my car's a mess.
translation.es: - Bueno, pero yo manejo.- Está bien. Mi auto es un asco.

translation.en: I'll get my coat!
At some point, you are gonna have to tell me where we're going.
The Harrison Community Center. Have you been recently?
You know, I don't think I've ever been inside.
Really?
Well, that answer is about to change.
I spent many, many hours here as a kid.
translation.es: Pasé muchas horas aquí de niña.

translation.en: You did?
[Molly] Ahh! I love your costume!
-Christmas ballerina! -Wow!
Excellent twirling. Very well done.
So, all the kids here, it's just for the holiday, or is this a regular thing?
translation.es: ¿Los niños vienen solo por las fiestaso es algo que ocurre a menudo?

translation.en: The Harrison Community Center offers after-school, weekend, holiday care for all kids.
translation.es: El centro ofrece actividades para niñosluego del horario de clases y los findes.

translation.en: Everyone's welcome, and it's free.
Wow, they are so creative.
You mind if I help? Need a hand?
Hold it there.
And then you can, with the other hand, grab that.
translation.es: Y ahora toma eso con la otra mano.

translation.en: Nice!
This is actually where I learned about royal icing and piping techniques.
translation.es: De hecho, aquí aprendía decorar con glaseado y manga.

translation.en: -You learned that here? -Mm-hmm.
Ms. Zona was the wonderful cookie teacher who taught us.
translation.es: La Sra. Zona era una maestra maravillosa.

translation.en: She was the best. She's the reason why I became a baker.
translation.es: Era la mejor.Por ella me dediqué a la pastelería.

translation.en: Hi, Molly. [laughs]
Amber runs Bendell Bakery, and she volunteers here on her days off.
translation.es: Amber tiene una pasteleríay es voluntaria aquí.

translation.en: -Hi, Amber. -Hi.
Well, Molly and I, we switch off weekends.
But she hosts a cooking class for the kids in her very own kitchen.
translation.es: pero ella da una clase de cocinapara niños en su propia tienda.

translation.en: She's pretty fantastic.
-Yes, she is. -Mm-hmm.
I'll be right back.
Growing up, both my parents worked,
so my brothers and I spent almost every day here.
translation.es: así que mis hermanos y yoveníamos aquí a diario.

translation.en: The money they saved helped put us through college.
translation.es: Pudimos estudiargracias a lo que ahorraron.

translation.en: I really am so grateful to your family. We all are.
translation.es: Estoy muy agradecida con tu familia,como todos aquí.

translation.en: Thank you for sharing that with me.
Whoa. Oh! Sorry.
Hey, Stephen would like to give you something.
Would you like a Christmas cookie?
Uh, don't mind if I do.
Can I take that one? Oh, thank you.
Did you ice these? Are you sure? They look professionally decorated.
translation.es: ¿Seguro que tú las decoraste?Parecen hechas por un profesional.

translation.en: Yes, I'm sure.
Wow. That…
That is one of the best Christmas cookies I've ever had, young man.
translation.es: Jamás había probadouna galleta navideña tan rica.

translation.en: And the icing is perfect.
I've been decorating cookies since I was a little kid.
Well, you keep up the good work, the great work.
I… I didn't catch your name.
-It's Carson. -Carson?
-As in a Harrison? -Mm-hmm.
I can't begin to tell you how thankful we all are to your family
translation.es: No sé ni cómo expresar lo agradecidosque estamos con tu familia

translation.en: for everything that they've done for the town! From the center, to the arts program in the school.
translation.es: por todo lo que hacen por el pueblo,desde el centro hasta el programa de arte.

translation.en: Well… really, for everything.
Your family is the best!
-I mean, I could go on and on. -Thanks.
-Thanks. -Okay, well, I should…
Okay.
Come back again soon!
-Yeah! -Merry Christmas!
-Bye! -Merry Christmas!
-Happy holidays. -Bye.
-Thank you very much. -Okay. Come again.
And that is what happens when people find out I'm a Harrison around here.
translation.es: Y eso es lo que pasacuando se enteran de mi apellido.

translation.en: This isn't about you, it's about the Harrison Foundation, all the good they do for so many kids.
translation.es: No se trata de ti, sino de la fundacióny lo mucho que ayudan a los niños.

translation.en: No, I get that, but my entire life,
translation.es: Lo entiendo, pero toda mi vida

translation.en: all anyone ever talked about was the Harrison Foundation.
translation.es: me hablaron sin pararde la Fundación Harrison.

translation.en: I felt like everything was mapped out for me, especially by Aunt Jean.
translation.es: Sentí que la tía Jeanya tenía toda mi vida planeada.

translation.en: Okay. I wouldn't like that either, feeling like I don't have a choice.
translation.es: Bueno, a mí tampoco me gustaríaque me impusieran algo.

translation.en: Yeah, that's why I bought that camera, that plane ticket.
translation.es: Por eso compré una cámaray un pasaje de avión.

translation.en: I had to get out before I got trapped.
translation.es: Sentía que debía huir de aquí.

translation.en: Well, you have a great career doing what you love.
translation.es: Tienes una gran carreraen algo que te gusta.

translation.en: I understand not wanting to give that up.
translation.es: Entiendo que no renuncies a ella.

translation.en: I loved it in the beginning when I was caught up in the excitement of that kinda life.
translation.es: Me gustaba al principio,cuando aún me atraía ese estilo de vida.

translation.en: But now…
Now?
You wanna go get a hot cider?
Yeah. Sure, I have time.
Let's go to Nick's Café.
translation.es: Vamos a la cafetería de Nick.

translation.en: -Nick's? -Nick's.
-Seriously, thank you so much for today. -You're welcome.
translation.es: CAFETERÍA DE NICK - En serio, gracias por lo de hoy.- De nada.

translation.en: Yeah. I'm ashamed to say that I've seen the financial reports,
translation.es: Me avergüenza admitirque he visto los informes financieros,

translation.en: but that is the first time that I've seen people directly benefiting from my family's foundation.
translation.es: pero es la primera vez que veoa la gente que la fundación ayuda.

translation.en: It was something.
You were great with the kids. Like it or not, I think you're a natural.
translation.es: Eres bueno con los niños. Te sale natural.

translation.en: Thanks.
Enough about me; did you always wanna be a chef and caterer?
translation.es: Basta de hablar de mí.¿Tú siempre quisiste ser chef?

translation.en: Yeah, when I was a kid, I used to have Christmas tea parties with my dolls and dinosaurs.
translation.es: Sí, de pequeña, les servía el téa mis muñecas y mis dinosaurios.

translation.en: Dinosaurs? At a Christmas tea party?
T-Rex would have three helpings, which is the greatest compliment for a cook.
translation.es: El tiranosaurio repetía varias veces.Era un gran halago.

translation.en: -Was probably the best meal of his life. -It was.
translation.es: - La mejor comida de su vida.- Sí.

translation.en: I hope your aunt feels the same way.
translation.es: Espero que tu tía opine igual.

translation.en: Look, please do not stress about her.
translation.es: Oye, no te estreses por ella.

translation.en: I'm gonna be with you every step of the way, I promise.
translation.es: Prometo que no te dejaré sola.

translation.en: Thank you.
Isabella, my agent.
We've talked so much about me and the foundation, -I really wanna… -[chiming resumes]
translation.es: Hablamos mucho de míy de la fundación, pero quería…

translation.en: I'm sorry.
No, she's… not extremely patient. Probably makes her a great agent.
translation.es: Digamos que no es muy paciente.Debe ser por eso que es buena agente.

translation.en: That's okay. We should get going anyway. I left Christina holding down the fort.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Igual ya debemos irnos.Dejé sola a Christina.

translation.en: I guess we should.
Oh, Carson, give me some advice.
Do you think that candle should be over there? -Balance? -Uh…
translation.es: ¿Crees que debería mover esa vela allípara que quede equilibrado?

translation.en: No. No, I think it looks great.
How are plans going for the dinner?
It's great. She's great.
Everything is going to be… oh, what's the word I'm looking for?
Oh, yeah.
-Great. -Great.
I know this isn't how you would choose to spend your time at home,
translation.es: Sé que preferiríasestar haciendo otra cosa,

translation.en: but I do appreciate the help.
Of course.
To tell you the truth, catering, event planning, it's kind of fun.
translation.es: Para ser sincero,esto de planear eventos es divertido.

translation.en: This is the first year we won't have a silent auction.
translation.es: Este será el primer añoen el que no organizaremos una subasta.

translation.en: -What about the antiques? -I'm afraid that didn't work out.
translation.es: - ¿Y las antigüedades?- No llegamos a nada.

translation.en: Oh, no.
It is what it is. We will get through the best we can, as always.
translation.es: Así es la vida.Nos la arreglaremos lo mejor que podamos.

translation.en: -There has to be other places-- -It's too late in the year. People are already gone for the holidays.
translation.es: - Debe haber otros…- Es tarde. La gente ya se fue de viaje.

translation.en: It's been a long day.
I'm tired, I'm gonna turn in. Good night.
translation.es: Estoy cansada.Iré a la cama. Buenas noches.

translation.en: Good night.
Okay.
You taking that up for Aunt Jean? -Is she feeling okay? -Oh, don't worry, she's not ill.
translation.es: - ¿Es para la tía? ¿Se siente bien?- Tranquilo. No está enferma.

translation.en: I think it's just all the stress of the Gala.
translation.es: Creo que la gala la tiene agotada.

translation.en: A couple more days, it'll be over for another year.
translation.es: Unos días más y todo terminará por un año.

translation.en: Carson, Jean has devoted her entire life to this foundation
translation.es: Carson, Jean ha dedicadotoda la vida a la fundación

translation.en: and to serving the people of the community.
translation.es: y a servir a la comunidad.

translation.en: She deserves to be catered to now and then.
translation.es: Merece que la atiendan cada tanto.

translation.en: I appreciate how much you care.
It's impossible for anyone who knows your aunt not to care about her.
translation.es: Una vez que la conoces,es imposible no querer cuidarla.

translation.en: It is rare to meet someone who is so genuinely selfless.
translation.es: No es muy frecuentetoparte con alguien tan altruista.

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me.
Robert, she's lucky to have you.
Thank you for saying so.
Now, I need to call a few more auction houses, see if I can find anything at all.
translation.es: Seguiré llamando a casas de subastaspara ver si conseguimos algo.

translation.en: That's a good idea.
-Hi. -Hi.
I haven't seen you for a few days. I've been prepping at my place with Christina.
translation.es: - Hace días que no te veía.- Estuve cocinando con Christina.

translation.en: -I sent you updates. -Oh, I know.
translation.es: - Te mantuve al tanto.- Lo sé.

translation.en: I just like getting the updates in person better.
Well, we're in good shape. Ahead of schedule, actually.
translation.es: Todo va bien. Hasta vamos adelantados.

translation.en: -Good. -I just came to drop a few things off.
translation.es: - Genial.- Vine a traer unas cosas.

translation.en: I have a second cooler, if you wouldn't mind. Oh, of course not.
translation.es: - ¿Podrías ayudarme con la otra hielera?- Claro.

translation.en: How's Jean feeling?
Oh, better. I think she was just upset 'cause of the silent auction.
translation.es: Mejor. Creo que solo estaba tristepor lo de la subasta.

translation.en: I called a dozen places, and nothing.
translation.es: Llamé a varios lugares,pero no conseguí nada.

translation.en: Won't people donate to the foundation with or without the auction?
translation.es: ¿La gente no dona a la fundaciónsi no hay subasta?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, they will, but… it's tradition.
translation.es: Bueno, sí, pero es una tradición.

translation.en: I think people like party favors, even if they pay for it themselves.
translation.es: La gente quiere souvenirs,por más que salgan de su bolsillo.

translation.en: -You've been taking photos all week. -Yeah, every week.
translation.es: - Tomaste fotos toda la semana.- Sí, como siempre.

translation.en: -How many do you have? -Oh, I don't know, hundreds.
translation.es: - ¿Cuántas tienes?- No sé, cientos de fotos.

translation.en: -I haven't counted. -Will you show me?
Yes.
How long to get them printed and framed?
Molly, that is a brilliant idea.
Do we have everything?
Yeah, I think so.
And…
I got this for Aunt Jean's collection.
translation.es: compré esto para la colección de la tía.

translation.en: -I think she'll like it. -Yeah, I think so too.
translation.es: - Creo que le gustará.- Yo creo que sí.

translation.en: Should we tell her?
Well, why don't we set everything up first, and then we could surprise her just before the Gala?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si primero organizamos todoy la sorprendemos justo antes de la gala?

translation.en: Okay. Sounds like a plan.
Do you think people are actually gonna bid on these?
-Are you fishing for a compliment? -[laughs]
It's been a while since I've shared this kinda work. They could all use a little touching up.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no tomo este tipo de fotos.Les hacen falta unos retoques.

translation.en: If I had more time…
No one is gonna critique them.
They're gonna bid on a photo that makes them feel something.
translation.es: Pujarán por una foto que les evoque algo.

translation.en: Like this one.
It reminds me of when my parents used to drive us around town to look at Christmas lights.
translation.es: Me recuerda a los paseos con mis padrespara ver luces navideñas.

translation.en: It always made me feel so warm and cozy.
translation.es: Es algo que siempre me tocó el corazón.

translation.en: What? -I think you just gave me another idea. -[phone chimes]
I need to get back to the kitchen, but I can't wait to hear that idea.
translation.es: Debo volver a la cocina,pero quiero oír esa idea.

translation.en: Yeah, I've gotta see if it works first.
-Great. -Bye.
I thought you might like some tea.
Oh, Robert, you are so thoughtful.
Why don't you join me? I'd be glad to.
translation.es: - ¿Te sientas a tomarlo conmigo?- Sí, encantado.

translation.en: You anticipated me.
That's because you are always so thoughtful.
translation.es: Es que tú siempre eres muy considerada.

translation.en: Thank you.
-You always spill. -I do not.
Carson surprised me with him. That was thoughtful of him.
translation.es: - Carson me sorprendió con esto.- Qué considerado.

translation.en: -Cheers. -Cheers.
You know, I always looked forward to the Christmas Gala all year.
translation.es: Siempre he esperado con ansiasla gala de Navidad,

translation.en: Now… Well, now it just feels like a chore.
translation.es: pero ahora la siento máscomo una obligación.

translation.en: You've been doing the lion's share of the work for so long.
translation.es: Hace muchos añosque te ocupas de casi todo sola.

translation.en: Go ahead.
Say it, I was foolish hoping that Carson would change his mind
translation.es: Dime que fue tonto creerque Carson cambiaría de opinión

translation.en: about settling down and taking over the foundation.
translation.es: y se haría cargo de la fundación.

translation.en: It wasn't foolish.
Carson has always done things in his own way and in his own time.
translation.es: Carson siempre ha hecho todoa su manera y a su tiempo.

translation.en: You may be surprised. I don't think so.
Once this Gala is done, I think I am going to have to focus on finding someone else.
translation.es: Cuando la gala termine,deberé ponerme a buscar a otra persona.

translation.en: What you have done with the foundation, no matter what happens or who you bring on board,
translation.es: Con todo lo que hiciste con la fundación,sin importar quién se haga cargo,

translation.en: you will always be an inspiration to everyone who knows you.
translation.es: siempre serás una inspiración para todos.

translation.en: That means more than you know.
translation.es: Eso significa más de lo que crees para mí.

translation.en: Thank you. You are a dear.
Did you confirm the servers?
-Yeah, they'll be here by four. -Great.
Carson said most people should be gone by 9:00, and if anyone complains, to send them to him.
translation.es: Según Carson, durará hasta las nueve.Si alguien se queja, él se ocupará.

translation.en: He's been very helpful this week.
You really like him.
Don't deny it.
I mean, he's smart, and funny, and charming.
translation.es: Bueno, es listo, gracioso y encantador.
